_header: In token that death should the lust of man refrain
_description: A story of King Palaan — one introductory stanza rhyme royal and nine quatrains

TCD432.First Lines:
In token þat dethe shuld þe lust of man refrayneBy
                    remembraunce in veyne prosperite…
TCD432.Last Lines:
…Þat for no pryde nor veyne prosperiteÞe drede of
                    god from her hertis shuld be
TCD432.Editions:
Brotanek,  Rudolph. 
             Mittelenglische Dichtungen aus der Handschrift 432 des Trinity College
                in Dublin.
         Halle: Niemeyer, 1940: 52.
